department_name: DPSCS: DIV OF CAPITAL CONST AND FACILITIES MA
location_name: DPSCS: DIV OF CAPITAL CONST AND FACILITIES MA
organization_name: Maryland Department of Public Safety and Correctional Svcs
short_description: Security Electronics Upgrade at SMPRU Contract No.KP-000-160-C01
description: This contract is comprised of the upgrade of the CCTV system at the SMPRU facility at 14320 Oaks Road, Charlotte Hall,  Maryland 20622.  The CCTV system shall be upgraded to include 6 IP cameras that are building wall mounted. The Pre-Bid meeting is scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 10:00 a.m. and will be held at the SMPRU site (location within the facility is to be assigned upon arrival.) For Directions, please call 301-274-4701. Bid documents are available only online from eMaryland Marketplace (eMM). Those are the only official documents to be used by Bidders for this invitation for Bid (IFB). The Bidders shall print on their own stationary, the required documents for submitting their bid (Construction BID Form: Bid Proposal Affidavit, Contractor Questionnaire, etc.) and submit to the Owner (DPSCS, Division of Capital Construction and Facilities Maintenance) in a sealed envelope which clearly indicates that the envelope contains a sealed bid for this project, the bid due date and the name and address of the Bidder., Attention:
nigp_class_item_with_description: 680 - 02 : Access Control Systems and Security Systems
nigp_class_with_description: 680 - POLICE AND PRISON EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES

short_description: Security Electronics Upgrade at SMPRU Contract No.KP-000-160-C01
description: This contract is comprised of the upgrade of the CCTV system at the SMPRU facility at 14320 Oaks Road, Charlotte Hall, Maryland 20622. The CCTV system shall be upgraded to include 6 IP cameras that are building wall mounted. The Pre-Bid meeting is scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 10:00 a.m. and will be held at the SMPRU site (location within the facility is to be assigned upon arrival.) For Directions, please call 301-274-4701. Bid documents are available only online from eMaryland Marketplace (eMM). Those are the only official documents to be used by Bidders for this invitation for Bid (IFB). The Bidders shall print on their own stationary, the required documents for submitting their bid (Construction BID Form: Bid Proposal Affidavit, Contractor Questionnaire, etc.) and submit to the Owner (DPSCS, Division of Capital Construction and Facilities Maintenance) in a sealed envelope which clearly indicates that the envelope contains a sealed bid for this project, the bid due date and the name and address of the Bidder., Attention:
nigp_class_item_with_description: 725 - 54 : Security Systems and Equipment, Communications (Incl. Prison Visitation Telephones) (EFFECTIVE 3-1-07 THIS CLASS-ITEM INACTIVATED FOR NEW USE, REFER TO 838-34)
nigp_class_with_description: 725 - RADIO COMMUNICATION, TELEPHONE, AND TELECOMMUNICATION EQUIPMENT, ACCESSORIES, AND SUPPLIES (SEE CLASS 840 FOR TELEVISION EQUIPMENT) (EFFECTIVE 3-1-07 THIS CLASS INACTIVATED FOR NEW USE. REFER TO CLASSES, 726, 838 AND 839)

contact: email:  rrose@chesapeakebeachmd.gov or call Richard Rose, Town Administrator (410) 257-2230

description: To provide temporary supplemental/backup Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) and Registered Nurse (RN) nursing services for the residents at Potomac Center in Hagerstown, Maryland.  Need a price per hour for LPN and RN each.  No shift, overtime or holiday differential.  All nursing staff agencies shall be licensed by the Maryland Office of Health Care Quality or as otherwise provided by law.  Also shall have provided temporary nursing services in other health care settings which may provide respite or acute, long term or chronic services to clients with intellectual disabilities for at least a minimum of one year.  All LPN's and RN's shall be licensed by the Maryland State Board of Nursing.  Line 1 is for LPN services per hour

short_description: Billboard Ad Placement to Decrease Youth Access to Tobacco - I-95 Corridor
description: Place ads on Bulletin-size billboards (14' x 48') on Interstate 95 in Baltimore City, Baltimore County, and Prince George's County for four (4) weeks. The ads will support initiatives to promote responsible tobacco retailing in sales outlets, change community norms, and reinforce that selling tobacco to youth under the age of 18 is in violation of local, state and federal laws.

short_description: ECI Hot Water Replacement Westover, MD Contract No. KO-000-160-C01
description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping.  DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system.  Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly.  The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP.  The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence.  In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_with_description: 906 - ARCHITECTURAL SERVICES, PROFESSIONAL

description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_with_description: 906 - ARCHITECTURAL SERVICES, PROFESSIONAL

short_description: ECI Hot Water Replacement Westover, MD Contract No. KO-000-160-C01
description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_with_description: 906 - ARCHITECTURAL SERVICES, PROFESSIONAL

short_description: ECI Hot Water Replacement Westover, MD Contract No. KO-000-160-C01
description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_item_with_description: 906 - 69 : Prisons and Jails, Architectural Design Service

description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. short_description: ECI Hot Water Replacement Westover, MD Contract No. KO-000-160-C01
description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_with_description: 909 - BUILDING CONSTRUCTION SERVICES, NEW (INCL. MAINTENANCE AND REPAIR SERVICES)

DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_item_with_description: 910 - 36 : Heating, Air Conditioning, and Ventilation Maintenance and Repair Services (Including Installation)
nigp_class_with_description: 910 - BUILDING MAINTENANCE, INSTALLATION AND REPAIR SERVICES

description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_with_description: 913 - CONSTRUCTION SERVICES, HEAVY (INCL. MAINTENANCE AND REPAIR SERVICES)

organization_name: Maryland Department of Public Safety and Correctional Svcs
short_description: ECI Hot Water Replacement Westover, MD Contract No. KO-000-160-C01
description: SUMMARY OF WORK: This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the Design/Build (D/B) construction of a new High Temperature Hot Water (HTHW) distribution system at the Eastern Correctional Institution (ECI) complex in Westover, Maryland, that will be a combination of above ground and below ground piping. DPSCS proposes to abandon the existing buried piping in place with selective removal of manholes/piping on condition that there is no conflict with existing system. Additionally, the entire new above ground systems are to be protected along roadways, parking areas, and other traffic areas with an MDOT approved traffic guardrail assembly. The Proposer shall submit sample details of recommended guardrail system in response to this RFP. The co-generation facility (located on site) operates to provide a high degree of reliable services to all the buildings except two (2) Maryland Correctional Enterprises plants inside the perimeter fence. In addition, steam is provided to
nigp_class_with_description: 914 - CONSTRUCTION SERVICES, TRADE (NEW CONSTRUCTION)
